timeline.message:
Track SSLCipher supported status

This allows consumers of SSLCipher to know whether or not a given
cipher suite is supported in various conditions:

 - With TLSv1.3, or
 - In FIPS mode, or
 - With RSA or ECDSA certificates.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Enums have built-in valueOf() so this method is redundant.
https://www.tutorialspoint.com/java/lang/enum_valueof.htm
timeline.author: edewata

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry. I was thinking I was going to need to add aliases here (between IANA and JDK names -- kinda like SSLVersion has), but I don't think I need to actually. So I can remove this.
replies.author: cipherboy
